title: Goats' cheese and onion tarts
description: Served with a lemony rocket salad, these delicious tarts make a great summer dish.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need 4 x 10cm/4in loose-bottomed tart tins.
ingredients: small sprig fresh thyme, leaves only
25g/1oz lard (or more butter for a vegetarian option)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
